Lehnsherr

  • Classic buildup strategy game
  • Settlement building
  • Mining  resources
  • Research into new buildings and units
  • Conquer enemy territories and resources
  • Two game modes: "Conquest" and "Ancestor Stone"
  • Medieval / Fantasy setting

  • Strokes of fate
  • Singleplayer mode
  • Multiplayer mode local and online
  • Tutorials
  • Optimized for Smartphone and Tablet
  • English and German version
  • It's free

Description
In Lehnsherr you create your own settlement in a turn-based strategy game. You have to keep an eye on your resources as well as on your opponents.
At the beginning you have to get the desired resources as fast as possible. Because your settlers are not alone. Depending on the level, there are several enemies who claim this area just like you do. Therefore decide which of your watchtowers should be equipped with soldiers. These are necessary to defend your area or to attack your opponent and weaken him sensitively.
But your comrades-in-arms are not the only problem, you also have to cope with strokes of fate like floods or famines.
New buildings and military abilities can also be researched in the library.
Lehnsherr can be played alone against up to 3 computer opponents. You can also play against up to 4 human players on a single device (local multiplayer mode) or in pairs via the Internet (online multiplayer mode).

Lehnsherr is a classical build-up strategy game.
